titles.title: Protection From Coercive Employment Agreements Act

A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1964 and other civil rights laws to prohibit employers from requiring employees to submit claims relating to employment discrimination to mandatory arbitration.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4266-4268)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 4/13/1994--Introduced. Protection From Coercive Employment Agreements Act - Amends the Civil Rights Act of 1964 and certain other civil rights laws to prohibit employers from requiring employees to submit employment discrimination claims to mandatory arbitration.
